  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Submit feedback"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/conversations/{conversation_id}/submit-feedback"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Submit user feedback for a conversation

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Conversation ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"version":{"type":"string"},"permissions":{"type":"string","default":"private"},"polarity":{"type":"string"},"feedback":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Feedback submitted successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Error submitting feedback","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
